external_references.source_name: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025
external_references.description: Sudeep Singh. (2025, April 16). Latest Mustang Panda Arsenal: PAKLOG, CorKLOG, and SplatCloak | P2. Retrieved September 12, 2025.

objects.description: [PAKLOG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1233) has used `GetForegroundWindow` to access the foreground window. (Citation: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025)  [PAKLOG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1233) has also captured text from the foreground windows.(Citation: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025)
